name: ARUM
description:
An independent video game By One Sugar Please Studio.

Arum is a 2D adventure game available on MacOS and Windows. The Linux version is coming soon.

A story

Live the adventure of a half-woman, half-flower creature stranded in a dreamlike world where exploration will be the key word.

In a strange world of metaphorical puzzles, find the way to the answer, to life between two worlds.

Hand drawn graphics :

All the graphics were made in digital illustration

Animation frame by frame

Frame-by-frame animation in line with traditional anime.

Try to find the answer to the character's question: What am I ?

Good Luck
